name: Krack-e-lacken
description:
~~Visual effects are not shown in the web version due to an engine incompatibility. Please consider downloading the Windows version for the full experience.~~

It's time to get krack-e-lacken! Sailing across the seas is hard work and there's countless dangers to face. From dangerous krakens to other ships looking to steal your loot. Every time you lose, you return to an island where you purchase upgrades and restock before trying again.

--- How To Play ---

Select your attack by clicking on it

Chargeable attacks show a bar, click the weapon as many times as possible before time runs out!
